item.name: Banshee Bow
item.description: A bow that has been enchanted by the dark powers of a witch.
item.effect: Damage +90 / Range 6 / Attack Speed +20% / Critical Damage +70 / -150 HP / Defense -40% / VIT Defense -35% / Vanishes HP by 4% of damages dealt / Requires Level 90 / Dexterity 80+ required to activate the bonuses
